topics.body: If I had superpowers I would be the equivalent of Yukari, except make it to where there was a dimension to mirror universes and as you got more along the dimension things would get progressively more and more far removed from reality.  Basically I would use subjective reality to create parallel universes that universe #1 would be our universe, but universe #999999999 would have a version of you able to throw fireballs from their hands as though it was completely normal.
